title: oten Women's Casual Sleeveless Cutout Twist Front Side Slit Ribbed Knit Party Bodycon Midi Dresses
description: This sexy cutout tank top dress is made from high quality, stretch rib knit fabric that is soft, skin friendly and fits perfectly.
Flattering sleeveless dresses, sexy side slit, high waist, below knee length, cut out twist front, bodycon dresses, slim fit to show off your charming curves.
Sleeveless summer dress for a casual day out with sneakers or dressed up with some nice sandals for a date night. It is very stretchy, fits snugly and shows off all your curves.
Perfect for night out, holiday, rehearsal, dinner, dating, cocktail, club, party, wedding guest, vacation, vegas and special occasions.
Size guide is on the last product image for reference. Hand wash/machine wash in low temperature water, hang to dry.
